name: Thor, Dog of Thunder in the Dark World
name_original: Thor, Dog of Thunder in the Dark World
description:
Summer Santa Jam 2021!

Code by Thomas and Elliot

Music by Max

Help Thordog destroy all the evil crystals in the Dark World!

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys to move

Space bar throws hammer, then space bar again to recall

The little colored rectangles are powerups. They last for a certain # of hammer throws.

Red = +damage

Yellow = knockback

Blue = slow enemies
